storyInfo: Grain Buds once heard a story of a talking stockbeast blocking the way, a dark cloud leaping out of a truck, and a passing celestial Xian who helped reunite them. Now she tells this story to the children.

attributes.content: The wind blows gently, tugging your sleeves like a mischievous child.
It brings many scents to share: the earthy aroma of freshly squeezed rapeseed oil, the crisp freshness of neatly stacked rice straws, and the fragrance of rice stir-fried in the pan.
And so, you know all that is happening in these fields.
Shu said she passed through fields like these on her way from Dahuang to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Are they wheat fields?
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: Not just wheat, but also rice, sorghum, and sometimes just wild grass, many plants whose names I don't know, all growing so tall.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: A narrow dirt road extended out from the field. It had just rained, and there were pesky mud pits all over the place.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: No, Grain Buds, please, no rain!
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: Alright. It was sunny.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: It was sunny, and the bugs and fowlbeasts chirped happily.
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: That's right. The sun made the grass nice and toasty. Bugs that can't take the heat went to hide in the shade.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Sounds so nice...
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: Dozing off already? Don't forget you promised to go to bed after this story, all of you. The doctors say you need to get lots of sleep.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What about you, Grain Buds? Are you going to bed, or are you gonna wait for Shu?
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: She won't be coming today because she has so much to do. I'll get some rest too, once you all fall asleep. I don't want this cold to get any worse.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Keep going, Grain Budsâ€”we'll be good.
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: A truck came rolling from afar, filled with fresh grain, and a thick layer of straw on top.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Why is there straw on top?
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: The young farmer driving the truck was in a hurry to get the food to the granary. He put a layer of straw over the grain, just in case it rained.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: But he's worried...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Why is there a dark cloud following me on a sunny day?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: I need to go faster. If it rains...
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Wh-What happened?
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: Don't worry, no one got hurt. But he found that the road before him was blocked as soon as he turned the corner.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Whose stockbeast and burdenbeast are these? Get them out of the way!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Heyâ€”
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: But nobody answered.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: He walked up to the burdenbeast, but there was no bridle on its neck, nor tag on its ears. The stockbeast had a saddle, but he couldn't get it to move, no matter how hard he pulled.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The dark cloud got closer. The anxious farmer got an idea and pulled a handful of straw from the truck.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Here! You can have this, if you come over here!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Over here, over hereâ€”
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Even the animals ignored him!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What did he do?
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: Why wouldn't they move?
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: What do I do? My grain will be ruined if it rains!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Wait, this isn't a trap to rob me, right? Is there somebody hiding in the trees?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: He was just imagining things.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Go! Shoo! Get lost!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: I think I have a whip in my truck for cutting through dense grass.
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Grain Buds...
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: The young farmer took out the whip, but hesitated. The burdenbeast and stockbeast looked at him placidly, without fear, without moving.
The dark cloud drifted ever closer.
He raised his whip up highâ€”
Stop!
Stop! I can get them out of the way.
attributes.name: Girl Passing By

attributes.content: Hey, how come you're in the story, Grain Buds?
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: It's not me, just a girl who happened to pass by. I'm just, er, playing her part.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: They're so docile, how could you bear to whip them?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What do you suggest, then?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Simple. I'll just ask politely. I've got a lot of experience.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You can talk to animals?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The girl who just happened to pass by walked over to the animals and leaned in to listen.
Hey, kidâ€”
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Shh!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Well, what are they saying?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: ...Nothing.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Moo?
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: I... I can't understand them anymore!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Hey, Grain Buds!
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: No fair! How come you put yourself in the story? You weren't there!
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: I told you, it's not me, just a girl who happened to pass by. Must be a student from a nearby school.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Well, what's her name, then? Was she in the story when Shu told it to you?
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: You ask too many questions!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Here, you're in the story too! What are you supposed to be, then?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I'm a tree! Watch me rain leaves on your head!
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: Is it true that you can talk to animals, Grain Buds?
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: Of course it's true. I've told you so many stories. Did you think I could come up with them all by myself?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Does the girl who just happened to pass by understand animals too?
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: Can I learn to talk to animals?
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: Well, I've asked a lot of people. Shu, Big Buffalo, and the Doctor. As for the answer...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Eager Children

attributes.content: You can do it, as long as you put your heart into it!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Some animals are very stubborn. It's not easy to get them to talk to people.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: But once you understand what they're trying to do, you can understand what they're saying.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Understand what they're trying to do?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I'm in no mood for jokes!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: The grain in this cart is a new species from Dahuang! The old man at the granary will kill me if it gets wet!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Dahuang? Oh yeah!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Look at the tag on the stockbeast's neck! It came from Dahuang!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Looks like it. How did it get here? It's a long way from Dahuang.
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Hey, I recognize you. You were pregnant at the time, and you were following in the rear of the pack, leisurely eating grass and basking in the sun.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What's with all these wounds? What happened to your baby? Did you get separated?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: ...Moo.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: The stockbeast bowed her head. The silent burdenbeast took a step towards it, and they cuddled together.
Did you come to find your baby?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll help you find it. Can you tell me about your baby?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: It's a good child.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: It talked!
attributes.name: Children

attributes.content: It has large, round eyes. We call it Roundie.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: Most of the time, it was quiet and content, following us closely.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: It's a strong child, keeping up with us on its trembling legs.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: Does Roundie look like you?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Very much, but not at all to your eyes.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: It's so small and likable... it hangs on to our shoulders lightly with its claws when it sits on us, so as not to hurt us.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: But how did you get separated?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: It's not its fault...
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: We had to leave.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: Leave Dahuang? Why? If you were looking for fresher pastures, you only needed to go as far as the river bank.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: We kept walking. When there was no path in the hills and rivers, we walked over them by stepping on rocks.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: But our baby was separated from us along the way.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: So you won't move until you find your calf?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Have you any idea how far Dahuang is from here? How long is that search gonna be?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Look at that dark cloud! It could rain at any moment!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Say something, girl!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: How about... how about you two move out of the way and let him pass? I'll stay and help you look for your baby.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: No. There is another reason.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Why won't the burdenbeast talk? Is he here to look for the baby?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: He cannot talk to you yet, for the same reason... a reason that you have not figured out yet.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: The young farmer sat down and cocked his head, looking at the dark cloud that was gradually descending, casting a shadow over the trees, road, burdenbeast, stockbeast, and humans.
Are you sleepy? Should we stop here?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: No! You're just getting to the good part!
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: Shh, keep your voice down, the young ones over there are asleep.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You can tell it to me quiet, Grain Buds! What did the lost baby look like?
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: The doctor who brought me to Rhodes Island said I have eyes like my mother... does the calf look like its parents?
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: If stockbeasts can talk, their baby can look like anything. It's just a story, no need to care so much.
attributes.name: Mischievous Child

attributes.content: Well, I DO care!
attributes.name: Timid Child

attributes.content: Shhâ€”do you want to hear what happened next or not? I promise that you'll find out what the calf looks like soon enough.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What are you muttering to yourself over there? I thought you said you could fix this!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: I'm working on it. She should be here like, now... let's wait a little longer.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What? That rain isn't waiting for anybody!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Just give me a sec!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I'm sorry. If you don't have a way... I'll have to use my whip.
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Wait, she's here! Over there!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: A Xian came by the road.
She had a few strands of millet in her hand, and there were a few muddy spots on her pants.
Are you going to the granary?
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: Yes, Exalted Xian! It's about to rain, and I have to hurry. Look over there...
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: You mean the dark cloud? Don't worry, it won't rain.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: And there's no need to hurry... the road up ahead has collapsed.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: Collapsed? How can that be? There shouldn't be any floods in this season.
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Which makes it all the more difficult to predict. Perhaps it was already damaged a few years ago by the mountain fissure, and it finally gave way today.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: You saved his life by blocking the path.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: Moo.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: You knew the road ahead would collapse?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: Is that the other reason?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Partly. He's not the only one we're trying to help.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: Yes. Now that you are aware of the danger ahead, it's time for us to go.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: Wait! I've figured out the other reason, haven't I? Why doesn't he want to talk to me?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Some words do not need to be said out loud to be understood.
attributes.name: Blocking Stockbeast

attributes.content: They're going?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: As if just realizing something, the farmer grabbed a bunch of grain from his truck and chased after the burdenbeast and stockbeast.
Wait! Thank you! I want you to have this!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: *huff* *huff* Wh-Why can't I catch them, even though they're walking so slowly?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: Those that are gone will remain beyond your grasp. It is the way of things. There is no need for regret.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: Look, the dark cloud is gone, just as I told you.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: The dark cloud was indeed gone, and sunlight shined through where it once was.
The young farmer panted with his hands on his knee, but he did not drop a single grain.
Suddenly, there was a sound from the truck. A little beastling poked its head out, then jumped from the cargo bed. It looked just like a dark cloud.
Apparently just woken up, it shook a bunch of straw off itself, having no idea how it got here.
I smell Mommy and Daddy! Where are they?
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: The young storm cloudbeast ran a few circles around the truck, leaping up and down.
Where's Mommy and Daddy? Where am I?
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Are you... Roundie?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You know me? Hey, you look familiar... have I met you before?
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Why were you on the truck?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I don't know. I just took a nap in a haystack because the sun was really warm.
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: When I woke up, Mommy and Daddy were nowhere to be found! But I could smell them!
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: They were just here! They're not far away! Look!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Your mommy and daddy!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: I... I don't recognize them. I only remember their scent.
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: How could you not recognize them?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Your eyes are big and round, just like that stockbeast.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I don't remember!
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: But they do... they said you were quiet and content when you were little, always following close behind them.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: They said your legs trembled, but you kept walking forward.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: They said that when you sat on their shoulders, you always grabbed lightly with your claws so you wouldn't hurt them.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Th-That's me!
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: The little storm cloudbeast spun around anxiously, on the verge of tears.
But I haven't seen them in years!
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Your mommy and daddy are over there! I'll take you to them!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The storm cloudbeast jumped into Grain Buds's arms. She sniffed and ran towards the burdenbeast and stockbeast under the red clouds.
She ran and yelledâ€”
Wait!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I found your baby!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The silent burdenbeast seemed to hear her, and stopped in its tracks, turning around to wait.
Grain Buds picked up her pace and tried to bring the storm cloudbeast to the burdenbeast.
But she simply could not close the distance with the burdenbeast, no matter how hard she tried.
I-It's no use. You can't catch them.
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: They're... gone.
attributes.name: Stray Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: But the burdenbeast was just standing there. It never left.
Grain Buds was exhausted and came to a stop, panting heavily. In the sunset, the shadows were stretched long and thin, like lines of ink that never fade.
I will do it.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I will take Roundie to her parents. I will make her recognize them.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: A-Are you really a Xian?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: There's no such thing as Xians. We're all the same: ordinary people who care with our hearts.
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: Isn't that so, girl who just happened to pass by?
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: With our hearts... that's how we hear animals and recognize lost loved ones, right?
attributes.name: Girl Passing By

attributes.content: In that case, I'll leave Roundie in your hands.
attributes.name: Girl Passing By

attributes.content: No need to worry. I promise...
attributes.name: Passing Xian

attributes.content: You're back! What about the calf?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: I left it to the Xian. She'll get Roundie to her mommy and daddy.
attributes.name: Girl Passing By

attributes.content: Say, can I hitch a ride?
attributes.name: Girl Passing By

attributes.content: Sure. Where are you going?
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: If it's not going to rain, I'm in no hurry. I plan to turn around and go to the granary by another way.
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: I'll go there too! I'll find another way to Dahuang from the granary.
attributes.name: Girl Passing By

attributes.content: Dahuang, eh? That's a long way. Maybe you'll run into that stockbeast and burdenbeast again!
attributes.name: Young Farmer

attributes.content: The girl who happened to pass by jumped onto the truck, into the thick layer of straw. Putting her arms behind her head, she gazed at the clouds in the sky.
The trucks started moving. Swaying in the wind, the straws tickled her face, but she did not mind.
The straw, made nice and toasty by the sun, was like the fur of a stockbeast past autumn, taking her into its gentle embrace.
She felt like she was sleeping on top of a stockbeast... or perhaps a burdenbeast, or a storm cloudbeast.
Zzzâ€”
Asleep already, Grain Buds?
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Exalted Xian...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oh, your blanket's come off again. Got to cover up with your blanket to get better quickly.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Remember me...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Mommy... Daddy... please... recognize me...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You've grown again. This blanket's getting small for you.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Zzzâ€”
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Sleep, Grain Buds. Sweet dreams.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: I'll stay by your side, until you wake.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice
